PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-06722003-05-13,  TC,  ,  , 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of LOUIS P. SALLEY of West Vancouver, British Columbia, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Brian Steck, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
